com.vmware.vapi.vmc.client.authz

Class CspSecurityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.vmc.client.authz.CspSecurityContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionContext.SecurityContext, CspAccessTokenSecurityContext

    public class CspSecurityContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements CspAccessTokenSecurityContext
    Represents a security-context for the Common SaaS Platform refresh-token flow that VMC uses.
